title: Nursing and Ideological Politics Education: Value Formation and Competency Enhancement through Integrated Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical application through building collaborative learning environments using digital devices and team-based project execution

learning_goals: Analysis of social responsibility and ethical values required in nursing practice through critical thinking and proposal of practical implementation plans

Learners analyze three medical policy and healthcare system cases using PBL (Problem-Based Learning), write comparative evaluation reports applying at least two ideological perspectives (e.g., neoliberalism vs. public healthcare) per case, and meet peer feedback and instructor evaluation standards (3.5+ on a 5-point scale)
Evaluation of political and social influences in nursing practice through team-based projects and development of effective communication strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
